title: Understanding and Applying Research Trends in Language MOOCs (LMOOCs)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online learning experience and foundational understanding of language acquisition
context.additional_context: Students use smartphones as primary learning tools, with an environment optimized for real-time video lectures and mobile-friendly resource sharing

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three major research trends and core topics in LMOOCs.
Learners can analyze learner engagement retention strategies in language MOOCs with case examples.
Learners can propose effective LMOOC utilization methods in smartphone-based learning environments.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
